overview: Match Day is centered on the day of the Uefa Champions League Final one of the worlds most watched events, we see that game by the eyes of Mohammed a 12 year old boy from Morocco and his friends at their day to day life, with them we learn a big lesson about team work, solidarity and the pursue of dreams. This documentary feature took approximately two years in filming and editing. Written by Nugui Brothers
tagline: A real story about a boy and his struggle to pursue a dream.
title: Match Day
